channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Spicy chicken tagine with apricots, rosemary and ginger
item.description:
Spicy chicken tagine with apricots, rosemary and ginger



This tagine is both fruity and spicy, and the rosemary and ginger give it a delightful aroma..

item.title: Festive roast leg of lamb
item.description:
Festive roast leg of lamb



My festive roast leg of lamb flavoured with rosemary, cloves, orange and cranberries makes a fantastic alternative to turkey on Christmas day or to feed your family and friends over the festive period..

item.title: Key lime trifle
item.description:
Key lime trifle



Madeira sponge makes the base of this zesty festive trifle .

item.title: Spicy butternut squash pasta with spinach
item.description:
Spicy butternut squash pasta with spinach



Hereâ€™s a vegetable-filled pasta bake that comes together in under an hour. The most time-consuming part of this recipe is prepping the squash. .

item.title: Beef & vegetable casserole
item.description:
Beef & vegetable casserole



A traditional braised beef stew with thick, rich gravy - an ideal recipe for cheap cuts, as slow-cooking guarantees a tender dish.
